001package com.telos.loops;
002
003import com.telos.loops.apikey.ApiKeyClient;
004import com.telos.loops.contacts.ContactsClient;
005import com.telos.loops.events.EventsClient;
006import com.telos.loops.internal.CoreSender;
007import com.telos.loops.ips.DedicatedIpsClient;
008import com.telos.loops.lists.MailingListsClient;
009import com.telos.loops.properties.ContactPropertiesClient;
010import com.telos.loops.transactional.TransactionalClient;
011import com.telos.loops.transport.OkHttpTransport;
012import com.telos.loops.transport.Transport;
013
014/**
015 * Main client for interacting with the Loops API.
016 *
017 * <p>Example usage:
018 *
019 * <pre>{@code
020 * LoopsClient client = LoopsClient.builder()
021 *         .apiKey("your-api-key")
022 *         .build();
023 *
024 * // Test API key
025 * ApiKeyTestResponse response = client.apiKey().test();
026 *
027 * // Create a contact
028 * var contact = new ContactUpdateRequest("user@example.com", null, null, null, null, null, null);
029 * client.contacts().create(contact);
030 *
031 * // Send an event
032 * var event = new EventSendRequest("eventName", "user@example.com", null, null, null);
033 * client.events().send(event);
034 * }</pre>
035 */
036public class LoopsClient {
037
038  private final ContactsClient contactsClient;
039  private final EventsClient eventsClient;
040  private final ApiKeyClient apiKeyClient;
041  private final DedicatedIpsClient dedicatedIpsClient;
042  private final MailingListsClient mailingListsClient;
043  private final ContactPropertiesClient contactPropertiesClient;
044  private final TransactionalClient transactionalClient;
045
046  private LoopsClient(CoreSender coreSender) {
047
048    this.contactsClient = new ContactsClient(coreSender);
049    this.eventsClient = new EventsClient(coreSender);
050    this.apiKeyClient = new ApiKeyClient(coreSender);
051    this.dedicatedIpsClient = new DedicatedIpsClient(coreSender);
052    this.mailingListsClient = new MailingListsClient(coreSender);
053    this.contactPropertiesClient = new ContactPropertiesClient(coreSender);
054    this.transactionalClient = new TransactionalClient(coreSender);
055  }
056
057  /**
058   * Creates a new builder for constructing a LoopsClient.
059   *
060   * @return a new Builder instance
061   */
062  public static Builder builder() {
063    return new Builder();
064  }
065
066  /**
067   * Returns the Contacts API client for managing contacts in your audience.
068   *
069   * @return ContactsClient instance
070   */
071  public ContactsClient contacts() {
072    return contactsClient;
073  }
074
075  /**
076   * Returns the Events API client for triggering email sending with events.
077   *
078   * @return EventsClient instance
079   */
080  public EventsClient events() {
081    return eventsClient;
082  }
083
084  /**
085   * Returns the API Key client for testing API key validity.
086   *
087   * @return ApiKeyClient instance
088   */
089  public ApiKeyClient apiKey() {
090    return apiKeyClient;
091  }
092
093  /**
094   * Returns the Dedicated IPs client for viewing dedicated sending IP addresses.
095   *
096   * @return DedicatedIpsClient instance
097   */
098  public DedicatedIpsClient dedicatedIps() {
099    return dedicatedIpsClient;
100  }
101
102  /**
103   * Returns the Mailing Lists client for viewing mailing lists.
104   *
105   * @return MailingListsClient instance
106   */
107  public MailingListsClient mailingLists() {
108    return mailingListsClient;
109  }
110
111  /**
112   * Returns the Contact Properties client for managing contact properties.
113   *
114   * @return ContactPropertiesClient instance
115   */
116  public ContactPropertiesClient contactProperties() {
117    return contactPropertiesClient;
118  }
119
120  /**
121   * Returns the Transactional client for sending and viewing transactional emails.
122   *
123   * @return TransactionalClient instance
124   */
125  public TransactionalClient transactional() {
126    return transactionalClient;
127  }
128
129  /** Builder for constructing a LoopsClient instance. */
130  public static class Builder {
131    private String apiKey;
132    private String baseUrl = "https://app.loops.so/api/v1";
133
134    private Builder() {}
135
136    /**
137     * Sets the API key for authentication.
138     *
139     * @param apiKey the Loops API key
140     * @return this Builder instance
141     */
142    public Builder apiKey(String apiKey) {
143      this.apiKey = apiKey;
144      return this;
145    }
146
147    /**
148     * Sets a custom base URL for the Loops API (optional).
149     *
150     * @param baseUrl the base URL
151     * @return this Builder instance
152     */
153    public Builder baseUrl(String baseUrl) {
154      this.baseUrl = baseUrl;
155      return this;
156    }
157
158    /**
159     * Builds and returns a new LoopsClient instance.
160     *
161     * @return a new LoopsClient
162     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if apiKey is not set
163     */
164    public LoopsClient build() {
165      if (apiKey == null || apiKey.isBlank()) {
166        throw new IllegalArgumentException("API key is required");
167      }
168      Transport transport = new OkHttpTransport();
169      CoreSender coreSender = new CoreSender(transport, baseUrl, apiKey);
170      return new LoopsClient(coreSender);
171    }
172  }
173}
